parameters.name: DryRun
parameters.description: Specifies whether to perform only a dry run, without performing the actual request. Set the value to false. This indicates that the system directly releases the capacity reservation.

parameters.name: PrivatePoolOptions.Id
parameters.description: The ID of the capacity reservation.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the capacity reservation. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
